A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson should hang his head in shame for destroying the Star Wars franchise. Terrible over scripted attempts at comedy that don't even come close to working\, a weak plot with more holes than Swiss cheese\, zero depth and worst of all\, the complete and utter waste of so many epic characters stories. Has he ever seen a Star Wars Film? Did he know there are 7 movies prior to this one? It makes Attack of the Clones look good and the inclusion of Jar Jar Binks would have significantly improved the Film\, it's that poor!
